TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GeneratorDriver extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Responsible for orchestrating a source generation pass
Docs.remarks: GeneratorDriver is an immutable class that can be manipulated by returning a mutated copy of itself. In the compiler we only ever create a single instance and ignore the mutated copy. The IDE may perform multiple edits, or generation passes of the same driver, re-using the state as needed.
